item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, August 30, 2024 at 1:05 AM UTC
item.description:
1. The secret inside One Million Checkboxes (377 points | 27 comments)
2. Bypassing airport security via SQL injection (1137 points | 267 comments)
3. Anthropic's Prompt Engineering Interactive Tutorial (81 points | 13 comments)

6. Imbue (Formerly Generally Intelligent) (YC S17) Is Hiring a Research Scientist ( | hide)

15. Raspberry Pi Pico does line rate 100M Ethernet (180 points | 24 comments)

23. OpenAI is good at unminifying code (826 points | 278 comments)
24. Dawn of a new era in Search: Balancing innovation, competition, and public good (193 points | 47 comments)
25. Judge rules $400M algorithmic system illegally denied Medicaid benefits (289 points | 78 comments)
26. Launch HN: Patchwork (YC S24) – Automatically add structured logs to your code (74 points | 24 comments)
27. Judges rule Big Tech's free ride on Section 230 is over (306 points | 359 comments)
28. How I learned to stop worrying and love userspace networking (138 points | 32 comments)
29. Show HN: An open-source, local-first Webflow for your own app (161 points | 43 comments)
30. Show HN: Homemade automated solar concentrator (254 points | 65 comments)
